attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop the introduction of water charges to Churches and schools.  If water bill charges are introduced to churches and schools, it could mean some churches will face closure, and schools could be faced with the choice of not employihg a teacher.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
